dialogue.text: I’ve been having this recurring dream lately, but I’m not sure what it means.
When I open my eyes (Though, I’m not actually opening my eyes) there are clocks, some water, and a bed.
It’s the same bed I fell asleep in. Which I think implies that I’m staring at where I’m supposed to be. Which then implies that this vast ocean is my bedroom.
And I think that is inaccurate.
I think there’s something more to this.
But when you’re caught inside a dream, there isn’t much you can do to actually {i}investigate,{/i} you know?
You need to wait until you’re awake for that.
But I haven’t enjoyed being awake lately.
In fact, I haven’t really {i}ever{/i} enjoyed that, thinking back on all of those nights beside the rocking chair and the mice who would take bites out of my ears in the middle of the night.
Now, even when I open my eyes, it’s like they’re stitched shut. Like I’ve blocked out the world to protect myself, and...maybe that’s for the best?
I mean, I have nothing now.
Well...on second thought, that isn’t true.
There are plenty of things I have. I’m just reluctant to name them during situations like this because it feels more like I’ve stolen them. That they were never mine to begin with.
If I wait long enough, I get a chance to see her.
It’s an incomplete her, but it’s her nonetheless.
She doesn’t speak much. But when she does, she warns me that there’s someone outside wearing her skin.
I tell her she’s silly because her skin still covers her bones. Then, the two of us kiss and spend the rest of the night covering each other in our respective bodily fluids.
I love being asleep now. And I love this recurring dream that has replaced the nightmares.
But there’s something I don’t love about it — and no, it’s not the fact that I know it isn’t real.
It’s the fact that it always changes when I least want it to.

There are other versions of her that come and interrupt us. And I think it’s supposed to be some sort of metaphor about how difficult it is to figure out who the {i}real{/i} her is, but I could be misunderstanding.
For all I know, I’ve been spraying my fluids on the wrong person this whole time. And for all she knows, she could be doing the same.
Or, alternatively, all three of them could be fake and they’re all just here to lure me under the covers for a special reward.
I don’t really care, to be honest.
She can have whatever she wants from me so long as it peels a layer or two off the pixel coating I have grown to abhor.
That coating causes pieces of reality to get lodged in my teeth when we’re making out sometimes, and I don’t even want to {i}start{/i} talking about how long they take to get out.
But I’m going to have to.
Because
As always
Things change
Akira.
You know I’m happier here, right?
Yeah...
Do you know it’s because I don’t have to be around you anymore?
You can’t abuse me in here. And that’s all you ever did, Akira.
Ami is right for keeping you locked away. She’s right for making sure you stay dormant in bed so you can’t ruin anyone’s life the way you ruined mine.
I could have been amazing without you, you know? I could have done anything.
I could have found someone my age...grown up alongside them. Gotten married. Had kids. You know, the whole nine yards.
But instead, all I got was a grown man addicted to the most bitter fruit of all.
Tell me, was the taste worth it in the end? Was I all you wanted me to be and more?
Because for me, you were nothing.
And you can have my body so long as we’re in here, but you will never have my heart.
You’re talkative today.
You brought company. I’m just trying to make a good first impression.
She doesn’t speak much. But when she does, she’s hurtful.
She tells me the truth. And she does it in a way that makes me fall even harder. But no matter how hard I fall in here, I never get hurt.
I’ve drowned a few times. And I’ve watched the clocks fade from my sight as the current pulled me back to Kumon-mi. But it has never {i}hurt.{/i}
And that’s sad.
Because I think I want it to.
Suddenly, she breaks apart. And it’s a feeling I’m all too familiar with.
But I know it’s for the best as I’ll see her again tomorrow, when all her pieces are sewn back together and all of mine are a little bit more rotten.
Hey. Can I tell you a secret?
Of course. You can tell me anything and everything.
I’m never coming back.
I like it here, Akira. And the girl who wears my skin isn’t as dangerous as you think.
She’ll let you do it raw. And she doesn’t mind if it goes into the wrong hole every now and then. Avoiding her just because she has my eyes won’t do you any good.
Plus, if there’s anything I know about the me who isn’t me, it’s that I am but I’m not pretty much always really probably horny maybe. You know?
No.
Oh.
Well, yeah.
Anyway, see you later.
One more thing, though.
What?
{i}Wake up or you’ll see it.{/i}
See what? What does that mean?
I gaze at the bed once more. I recall the fluids.
I recall them oh so fondly.
Aaahh! Akira! Fuck me! Fuck me harder!
Haaah! Agh....I’m...going as hard as I can!
No you’re not! I...hah...know you can do better! Give me...hah...give me...everything you’ve got!
My penis gets hard.
{s}sssssssssssssssssssssssssssss!{/s}
{s}kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk!{/s}
My penis gets soft.
What are you two doing here? This is the Pareidolia chapter and you’re supposed to be aligned with that HOPE guy I can never remember the name of.
A dream in which you want to see us!
A dream in which you’ll never be us!
Move. I want to watch the sex scene before I inevitably wake up and spend the rest of the day trying to fall back asleep.
He thinks he’s ready for the world!
Methinks that he should go fuck girls!
Methinks that you guys are annoying. Move.
I push the angels aside and watch as I penetrate her, desperately attempting to recall what her insides felt like as I pierced through them with an unreasonable amount of force.
All I remember is that it felt better than anything I’ve ever experienced in my life.
But was it worth it like she said before?
Not even close.

And I would castrate myself if it meant being able to measure my hand against hers. Or to help her tie a kimono for her very first festival. Or to teach her long division mixed with why it must be learned.
I remember so much apart from the tickle of her labia.
I can taste her sweat on my tongue while mine burns holes in her thighs as it drips from my brow.
Back here, buddy! Back here, guy!
Back here, man! That girl is...died!
One more mistake! I’ll have your tongue!
I’m sorry, S! I’m very dumb!
Seriously, can you guys go away now? This is the first bout of narrative sentience I’ve had in over 50,000 words and I really don’t want it spoiled by your unwanted inclusion.
Sentient, he thinks! He’s sentient, not!
A liar, methinks! His role, he’s forgot.................ten!
I have always been a liar, but I have not always been good at it.
The first time I was caught masturbating, I told my mother I was praying. And that, before I knew it, God had taken control of my body and acted of his own volition.
She did not believe me. She said that God would not prey upon children. So I asked her why those he chose to carry his message {i}did.{/i}
She did not like that, and I felt the taste of soap for the very first time that night. But it would not be the last.
Today, I am far more adept at concealing my tracks. But the fact that I can have sex with everyone I know without {i}bothering{/i} to hide them tells me they might just be invisible instead.
Regardless, this does nothing for my psyche or the sack of meat I’ve been reduced to these last few nights- or however long it’s been.
It does nothing to make me want to go home.
And I will remain content in this realm, near my bugs and my bed, for as long as this body will last.
Let it be known.
Let it be gospel.
Something approaches.
It’s the scissor angel.
{font=IBMPlexSansArabic-Regular.ttf}يجب أن تعيش.{/font}
{font=IBMPlexSansArabic-Regular.ttf}استيقظ يا طفلي.{/font}
I was warned that this might happen by a messenger pigeon sent to me on Christmas morning.
I should hear the angel out before it chops off my hands.
For what reason did your sorrows craft this realm? And what may I do to mend your broken heart?
I’m not sure you can, scissor angel.
You may call me “Gossamer.”
I appear in dreams to those who need me most.
Well, you’ve never appeared to me before and I’ve definitely needed some help recently.
Unfortunately, I was unable to appear before you until this very moment.
Busy schedule?
{font=IBMPlexSansArabic-Regular.ttf}.لا{/font} .I was absent as you’d closed your heart completely
But now, you’ve opened it once more. Which means you’re in desperate need of my assistance.
Aren’t you, Akira?
Why? Is there something you can do to actually {i}assist{/i} me?
Of course. There is no limit to my power.
Then bring her back.
I apologize, but that is something I can not do.
Yeah, of course it’s not.
You “divine beings” are all the same. You’re all talk until we actually {i}need{/i} something. Then, once we do, you act completely powerless and abandon us.
You’re misunderstanding, Akira. I am not abandoning you. It’s just that your request is impossible.
Then I guess there’s a limit to your power after all, isn’t there?
I suppose so... But still, I can feel your pain as if it is my own. And in feeling it, I can see you’ll be crushed if you remain this way.
Come, Akira. Embrace me. Cry into my bosom and I will absorb some of those feelings, so that {i}you{/i} may continue living the life that you are meant to lead.
And if I refuse?
I will chop your body into string and make a puppet of your flesh that can see the world as you did. Feel the things {i}you{/i} felt.
Yet you can’t make a meat puppet of her?
My child...
What exactly do you think the {i}new{/i} her is?
This ocean of your tears will drown even her reflection if your torment does not cease. But...I’m curious.
Why will you only cry in here?
Because no one can see me in here.
{i}We{/i} can see you in here.
We have {i}always{/i} seen you.
Yet, you’ve always ignored me.
Because you blocked us out, my child. I can not explain it any other way.
But now that you are willing to see us, it means you’re willing to {i}accept{/i} us. And I have come here to beseech that acceptance in exchange for absolution.
You can absolve me of my sins?
I can not erase the guilt your sins have caused, but I can weave you a spidersilk hammock and reserve your plot in Heaven’s Web.
Heaven’s Web?
The domain in which I preside — where there can be no sorrow, nor escape.
It’s the perfect match for a man like you- who wishes for naught more than stasis and eternal anesthesia.
I will not force your hand if you are not ready to extend it. But I implore you...{i}wake up.{/i}
Drag yourself out of bed or you will {i}never{/i} have the chance to live again. And my appearance before you now shows that this is something you desire.
You’re just lost.
Why can’t I just stay {i}here?{/i} I’m happy here.
If that were true, I would still be on the web.
You know well that this realm is just a waiting room. That reality is through the door behind you. And you’re far too weak to open it, but {i}I{/i} can open it for you.
I just need to hear you say the word. And if you don’t-
Know that more of us will come.
How many more?
Far more than you could ever imagine.
What will it be, Akira?
Open it.
As you wish.
I make my way over to the dorms.
It doesn’t look like anyone’s in the hall today.
What do I want to do?
I’ve been here long enough.
Goodbye now.
Wait!
If you leave now, you’ll never get to see the end of the game!
That’s right. You need to keep playing so you can bring me back one day.
And if it’s too hard right now, just try doing it the way you did in the beginning!
Yeah...Just...have sex with...everybody and...gain points and...stuff...
Ooooh! Like an RPG! Good thinking, Sana!
Not like an RPG, idiot. She’s talking about visual novels that use a hidden counter to determine how much affection heroines have with the protagonist.
Oh, is that how it works? I’ve always wondered how games keep track of that.
It’s not always...hidden, though...Like...sometimes you know...exactly how much affection...each character has...
That’s more of a western H-game thing. And none of those are any good, so...yeah.
Anyway! Don’t kill yourself, Sensei! You’ve still got so much left to see!
Yeah! And, speaking from a marketing standpoint, some of it {i}has{/i} to be happy or the story won’t sell!
And...in the event that...{i}none{/i} of it’s happy-
You can come have sex with me!
Or me!
Or...
Or me...
Or me. But please know that I {i}will{/i} make you buy me dinner afterwards.
{b}I don’t want to play this game anymore. None of it makes any sense.{/b}
Did it ever?
Yeah! Like, how do you know you’re not still in that room?
Oh, you’ve gotta be fucking-
